text: bla yakfiakum hdha almadad. wbshart 'ukhraa lkm: 'iin tasbiruu ealaa liqa' aleadui watataquu allah bfiel ma 'amrakum bih wajtnab ma nahakum enh, wayat kafaar "mk" ealaa alfawr msreyn lqtalkm, yazunuwn 'anahum ystaslwnkm, fa'iina allah yumidakum bikhamsat alaf min almalayikat mswwimyn ay: qad aelmu 'anfusahum wkhywlhm belamat wadhat
